name: Unbending will
description:
Good afternoon, you are on the development page of my game "Unbending Will". This is a cinematic souls like game with RPG elements. When creating this game, I focused on a cinematic picture and camera, souls like combat, ease of passage. The game has an atmospheric melancholy spirit of the Middle Ages.

I'm making the game by myself, I don't have a permanent job, so I'll be glad for any support:  1) buy demo materials  2) buy my horror game Police station mystery 3) donate to the development of the project 4) just rate the game, leave your feedback in the comments  5) recommend the game to your friends  6) interested in a publisher 7)interested in a sponsors

This will help me a lot in the development and improvement of my project, also your donations will give me the opportunity to fully concentrate on creating the game.
